page.title: 15HUNSINGORE SCHOOL
page.content: {Hunsingore School}was built in{1865 } and it has been open for 120 years.It is one of the smallest schools in {North Yorkshire.}It is in a rural part of the area.There are three classrooms but the children are all in one class. There is one full-time teacher and one part-time teacher.The full-time teacher is the head teacher. A hundred years ago the girls had one playground and the boys had another.In the middle of the yard there was a wall to keep them apart.Now all the children work and play together.After they have been to{Hunsingore School}the children go to{Boroughbridge High School}but if you wanted to go to}Wetherby High School or Knaresborough you have to have permission.You start{Hunsingore {School}when you are four years old and you leave when you are eleven years old.The other schools are 3 miles away
